absoPage.title: We Make Better Things In A Better Way
absoPage.description: By looking to the world's greatest innovator—Nature—we create shoes that deliver unrivaled comfort that you feel good in and feel good about.

bountiful.subtitle: Cool shades to put some spring in your step.

firstApp.title: Wear-All-Day Comfort
firstApp.description: Lightweight, bouncy, and wildly comfortable, Allbirds shoes make any outing feel effortless. Slip in, lace up, or slide them on and enjoy the comfy support.

secApp.title: Sustainability In Every Step
secApp.description: From materials to transport, we’re working to reduce our carbon footprint to near zero. Holding ourselves accountable and striving for climate goals isn’t a 30-year goal—it’s now.

threeApp.title: Materials From The Earth
threeApp.description: We replace petroleum-based synthetics with natural alternatives wherever we can. Like using wool, tree fiber, and sugar cane. They’re soft, breathable, and better for the planet—win, win, win.

cart.freeShipping: Congrats! You get free standard shipping.

arrivals.bannerLine1: The latest styles and limited edition colors
arrivals.bannerLine2: that you can only find here (while they last,
arrivals.shoesLine1: Classic sneakers. Sporty running shoes. Comfy loafers.
arrivals.shoesLine2: We got the wear-all day (with everything) shoes you and your closet need.
arrivals.menText2: —the fresh-out-of-the-box, squeaky-new styles that we’re excited to share with our fans. Allbirds is continually adding new styles, new
arrivals.menText3: colors, and new variations on our fan favorites.
arrivals.menText4: Check back often, because lots of our new arrivals are inspired by the natural world, like our awe-inspiring National Parks, the incredible outdoor activities that our customers love, or the
arrivals.menText5: natural color palettes around us. We also love to partner with designers, influencers, athletes, and philanthropists to envision new ways to look sharp while caring for the planet through

options.2: How do I make a return or exchange?

responses.1: Here are some common questions that might help you...
responses.2: You can make returns within 30 days with original receipt. Just visit our returns page and follow the instructions.
responses.3: Allbirds typically run true to size. We recommend ordering your usual size. If you're between sizes, size up for Tree styles or size down for Wool styles.
responses.4: We ship worldwide via DHL and FedEx. Delivery takes 3-5 business days domestically and 7-10 days internationally. Free shipping on orders over $50.
responses.5: We restock popular items every 2 weeks. Sign up for stock notifications on the product page!
responses.6: We respect your privacy. Our policy ensures your data is protected and never shared with third parties without consent.
responses.7: We're sorry! This item is currently out of stock. Check back next week or sign up for restock notifications.

faq.answer1:
A sustainable shoe is one made from natural, renewable materials with a low carbon footprint, using ethical and eco-friendly agricultural and manufacturing processes. At Allbirds, reducing our environmental impact has been our priority since day one. View our sustainability report here.

Renewable materials: We believe we can do better than synthetic materials. Allbirds replaces petroleum-based materials with natural, renewable ones and invents alternatives when a replacement doesn’t yet exist.

Regenerative agriculture: For us, the future of fashion is inextricably linked to the future of regenerative agriculture. Not only does it represent a huge opportunity to reverse climate change, it also provides benefits to local communities, biodiversity, ecology, the long-term viability of the land, and more. Learn more here.

Low carbon footprint: We’re holding ourselves accountable to lowering our carbon footprint and putting it on display next to each product.
